dcterms:creator: Olivier Bernard
Alain Lalande
Clement Zotti
dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset is used for automatic MRI cardiac multi-structures segmentation and diagnosis, providing a benchmark for evaluating deep learning techniques in cardiac imaging.
dcterms:title: ACDC

dcterms:creator: Michela Antonelli
Annika Reinke
Spyridon Bakas
dcterms:description: The Prostate dataset is part of the medical segmentation decathlon, which includes various tasks for evaluating segmentation algorithms across different modalities.
dcterms:title: Prostate

dcterms:creator: Xiahai Zhuang
Juan Shen
dcterms:description: The MMWHS dataset focuses on whole heart segmentation from MRI images, providing a comprehensive resource for evaluating segmentation methodologies.
dcterms:title: MMWHS

dcterms:creator: Danielle F Pace
Adrian V Dalca
Tal Geva
dcterms:description: The HVSMR dataset is utilized for interactive whole-heart segmentation in congenital heart disease, providing a platform for evaluating segmentation techniques in challenging cases.
dcterms:title: HVSMR
